nodes.text: Neil Lamont is an art director who served as co-production designer on the Star Wars stand-alone film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story after transitioning from work on Star Wars: The Force Awakens. He has written a foreword for The Art of Solo: A Star Wars Story and served as the production designer for Solo: A Star Wars Story.
He had begun working on a spin-off film set on Tatooine when it was cancelled.
Lamont's other film work includes serving as a supervising art director on the films James Bond: GoldenEye, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2.
